snippet.title: Abridge | Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Happy to announce that Abridge is coming out on October 14, 2022. It’s been a long 2.5yrs of hard work to get to this point. But, it was all worth it!!! Mark your calendars!!! Wishlist Now!!!

Please consider liking and subscribing to stay up-to-date on my progress and Abridge. It really means a lot and is greatly appreciated.

Wishlist and follow Abridge on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/15...
Follow on itch.io: https://aaron7eleven.itch.io/abridge

Have feedback? Share it using one of options below or in comment section:
Abridge Demo Survey Feedback: https://forms.gle/gW88zHKm5jb1of6u6
Steam Forum: https://steamcommunity.com/app/1594290/discussions/0/
Email: eventidegamesstudio@gmail.com

If you have any video idea or anything in specific you would like to hear more about, let me in the comments!

Music & Sound FX
Lucid Dreaming by | e s c p | https://escp-music.bandcamp.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/


Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
